name: Dimension Leap , Team - Git Pushed to the Limit
name_original: Dimension Leap , Team - Git Pushed to the Limit
description:
Game Jamfuser submission

A sci-fi plat-former where you play as an inter-dimensional blob trying to escape a research facility that you have been summoned into by a group of scientists for experimentation. 

Team (All First years)-

Benjamin Emdon - design - Glod#9788

James Heath -  Lead Programmer

Lyra Shillabeer - Artist - hamOverlord#5548

Billy Burton - Design (UI) - Gladio is my Daddio#7841

Izzy Raymond - Artist/Animator
